page.title: 03 KINGSWEAR COMMUNITY WEEK
page.content: In Kingswear there is a special week every year in May that is called Community Friendship Week.There are no cinemas or other entertainments in Kingswear so once a year a series of events is organized so that people can come out and enjoy themselves .Any money that is collected is used in the village.One thing that the money has been used for was a playing field for the school and the community. Constable Carthy the community constable of Kingswear has organized Community Week since 1981. Some events are: a crab fishing contest,a car treasure hunt,a sponsored walk and a coin trail. The first Community Week raised Â£2000 and in 1985 it raised Â£1400. { James Harris, Christian Parkes, { Tom Cooke.
